input.label: Choose Scheduled Search
input.populatingSearch: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=* | eval dssid=savedsearch_name+" (user="+user+", app="+app+")" | stats count by savedsearch_id,dssid | rename savedsearch_id AS ssid | sort ssid

chart.searchString: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=* savedsearch_id="$ssid$" | stats count BY status
chart.title: Status Summary

chart.searchString: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=* savedsearch_id="$ssid$" | timechart span="$span$" partial=false count BY status
chart.title: Status Details
Total RunTime
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=success savedsearch_id="$ssid$" | timechart span="$span$" partial=false sum(run_time) AS RunTime

chart.title: Total Result Count
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=success savedsearch_id="$ssid$" | timechart span="$span$" partial=false sum(result_count) AS ResultCount

chart.title: Total Actions
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status="success" savedsearch_id="$ssid$" | timechart span="$span$" count BY alert_actions
